title: Leaving the shelter of the Church to explore The Meaning Crisis in the pattern of the Wheel of Time
description:
#wheeloftime #christianity #meaning #worklifebalance #thewheeloftime 
#wotonprime #jordanpeterson 

“The wheel weaves as the wheel wills”

I talk a bit about the new wot tv show and go over some good clips from the four horsemen of meaning conversation and @paulvanderklay’s commentary. 

The bagpipe playing elf is actually my friend; check out the full video, it’s pretty funny. 
https://youtu.be/rpxnX01SWQU
